title: Phone won't charge. completely unresponsive, black screen. Can't access
content:
I was using my phone this morning. But As I arrived to work it became unresponsive. Completely black screen, no lights, wont connect to a charge, no heat coming off. It's a complete brick. I've tried leaving it on the charger for hours. Holding down combinations of power button and volume buttons. Nothing. 

I tried connecting it to the computer, nothing. 

At this point I want to get it taken apart. This has never happened to my devices before.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
